main event: A silver, unidentified flying object was sighted near a baseball diamond at Camp Carson, Colorado on December 5, 1952.
interesting points: The object appeared to change direction and became 'tear-shaped'.
An intermittent white light was observed in the vicinity for 2 minutes.
The object was observed to be lighted vertically and move at high speed, with no apparent propulsion system, trail or exhaust.
The sighting lasted for 2-3 minutes and was observed visually from the ground.
The observer was an experienced 1st Lieutenant, but the reliability of the report is unknown.
